'''''A Song of Aryador''''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] on [[12 September|September 12]]th, [[1915]]. The poem bears upon the matter of the shadow-folk (referring to Lost [[Elves]]) in ''Aryador'' ([[Ilkorin]]: "land or place of shadow", ''[[Hithlum]]''). It was published in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]''.<ref>{{LT1|Vn}}, pp. 138-139</ref>

==Poem excerpt==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">In the vales of Aryador
By the wooded inland shore
Green the lakeward bents and meads
Sloping down to murmurous reeds
That whisper in the dusk o'er Aryador:</poem>
